name: Rapport Ecart Entre Achat Et Reception
query:
select  
	mr_item.item_code as "Code Article:Link/Item:120",
	mr_item.parent as "Reçu d'achat::100",
	pi.parent as "Facture::100",
	 
	mr_item.supplier_part_no as "Réf::100",
	mr_item.qty as "Qts Reçus::100",
	pi.qty as "Qts Facture Fournisseur::150",
	@ecart:=ifnull(pi.qty , 0) -  ifnull(mr_item.qty, 0) as "Qts Écart:Float:100",
	 
	ifnull(mr_item.rate , 0) as "Taux:Float:150",
	@mecart:=ifnull(pi.amount , 0) - ifnull(mr_item.amount , 0)  as "Montant:Float:100",
	
	
	ifnull(mr_item.valuation_rate , 0) as "Taux de valorisation HT:Currency:180",
	ifnull(mr_item.valuation_rate , 0)*1.19 as "Taux de valorisation TTC:Currency:180",
	@total:=ifnull(mr_item.valuation_rate , 0)*@ecart  as "Total valorisation:Currency:150",
	ifnull(@total*1.19,0)  as "Total valorisation TTC:Currency:150"
from
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item` mr_item , `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pi
where
	mr_item.facture_item = pi.name
	 and pi.docstatus = 1 
	and mr_item.docstatus = 1 
	and ifnull(mr_item.qty , 0) != ifnull(pi.qty , 0)
report_name: Rapport Ecart Entre Achat Et Reception
